SEARCH
Package users

Class User

java.lang.Object
users.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<User>, Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Employee, Student
public class User extends Object implements Comparable<User>, Observer, Serializable
The `User` class represents a user in the system with attributes such as first name, last name, login credentials, personal information, and roles. Users can edit their data, view news, and subscribe to the university journal to receive updates on new research papers. This class implements the `Comparable` and `Observer` interfaces to support comparisons and observe updates from the university journal.
See Also:

      public void editData()
